text: Stop the hunt! We have found the perfect Easter egg recipe for everyone in the family to enjoy! Hop on board with KitKat bunnies and Smarties eggs for a delicious treat you won't want to miss!
a few drops of vanilla extract
6 Smarties mini Eggs (or mini Easter eggs)
Unroll the pastry dough and cut each into shape of egg
Place them on the baking sheet covered with baking paper and bake for 20 minutes. Let cool
Meanwhile, heat 100 ml liquid cream and vanilla extract in a saucepan
In the microwave, melt the white chocolate squares for 2 min 30 to 350 W. If necessary, add 30 sec. Mix
Add - in 3 batches - the hot cream to the melted chocolate
Then add - in 2 batches - the remaining 150 ml of cold cream
Whip the cream for 5 minutes at medium speed until it "rises". Put in a pastry bag
On the first shortbread egg, place small swirls of cream
Place the second dough on top and also place small swirls of cream
Add KITKAT Bunny, small strawberries, raspberries, Smarties Eggs (or mini Easter eggs) and some flowers.
